vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Rehoboth = "wide places or streets"
This name is used for:
1) the 3rd of a series of wells dug by Isaac in the territory of the Philistines
2) one of the 4 cities built by Asshur or by Nimrod in Asshur located close to Nineveh
3) a city of Saul or Shaul, one of the early kings of the Edomites
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   lugar; (b)   Rehobot-ir; ciudad en Mesopotamia; (c)   Rehobot sobre el río; ciudad en Mesopotamia
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利河伯 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "寬闊的地方或街道"
1) 以撒在非利士領土內所挖的第三口井 {#創 26:22|}
2) 寧錄在亞述城所建立的四個城市之一, 其地理位置靠近尼尼微城 {#創 10:11|}
3) 掃羅所在的城市, 此掃羅乃以東人早期的君王之一 {#創 36:37|}
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
利河伯 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "宽阔的地方或街道"
1) 以撒在非利士领土内所挖的第三口井 {#创 26:22|}
2) 宁录在亚述城所建立的四个城市之一, 其地理位置靠近尼尼微城 {#创 10:11|}
3) 扫罗所在的城市, 此扫罗乃以东人早期的君王之一 {#创 36:37|}

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of nin.veh (נִינְוֵה "Nineveh" H5210)
§ Rehoboth = "wide places or streets"
This name is used for:
1) the 3rd of a series of wells dug by Isaac in the territory of the Philistines
2) one of the 4 cities built by Asshur or by Nimrod in Asshur located close to Nineveh
3) a city of Saul or Shaul, one of the early kings of the Edomites
